item.title: CA Technologies is offering a free migration tool for Windows XP
item.description: If you need to upgrade from Windows XP, there’s a free tool that can help. Developed by CA Technologies, CA Desktop Migration Manager (CA DMM) is a software solution designed to manage, upgrade, and maintain laptops and desktops. It can also migrate a Windows XP computer to a more secure operating system. “Since Microsoft is no longer providing ongoing technical support and security updates for Windows XP, our customers are exposed to vulnerabilities and significant risks,” says Vic Mankotia, VP of Solution Strategy for Asia Pacific & Japan at CA Technologies.
